attributes.action: Equal Marriage Rights for Couples in Civil Partnerships
attributes.additional_details:
People in Civil Partnerships should have equal opportunity to be married. Currently only same sex couples, who are not committed to each other in a Civil Partnership, can legally marry in the U.K.

We would like to see access to marriage open to all couples, including those already committed to each other in a Civil Partnership!

We want to see an end to this inequality Now!
Any delay to this is unnecessary and unacceptable!
